name: cachu
description: A modern and simple key-value cache for Node.js.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && rimraf types && tsc && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --legal-comments=none --platform=node --outfile=dist/index.js
scripts.publish:canary: npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=canary && npm publish --tag canary
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish

author: Azury <hello@azury.dev> (https://azury.dev)
